Package de.cuioss.test.jsf.util

Class JsfEnvironmentHolder

java.lang.Object
de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.JsfEnvironmentHolder
public class JsfEnvironmentHolder extends Object
Holder for for JsfRuntimeSetup that provides shorthands for accessing contained JSF-Objects like FacesContext, ExternalContext, Application, ... and implicit accessor for objects like BeanConfigDecorator, ComponentConfigDecorator, ApplicationConfigDecorator and RequestConfigDecorator
Author:
Oliver Wolff
